basics.label: Assistant Chef
basics.summary: I am seeking a competitive and challenging environment where I can serve your organization and establish a career for myself. I want to excel in this field with hard work, perseverance and dedication.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Led and trained workers of 4 in food preparation, service, sanitation, and safety procedures. Resolved customer complaints regarding food service.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Check the quality of raw or cooked food products to ensure that standards are met. Prepare and cook foods of all types, either on a regular basis or for special guests or functions.
highlights: Checked the quality of raw or cooked food products
Prepared and cooked foods of all types

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Inspect and clean food preparation areas, such as equipment and work surfaces, or serving areas to ensure safe and sanitary food-handling practices. Ensure food is stored and cooked at correct temperature by regulating temperature of ovens, broilers, grills, and roasters.
highlights: Inspected and cleaned food preparation areas
Ensured food is stored and cooked at correct temperature

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Inspect and clean food preparation areas, such as equipment and work surfaces, or serving areas to ensure safe and sanitary food-handling practices. Substitute for or assist other cooks during emergencies or rush periods.
highlights: Inspected and cleaned food preparation areas
Substituted for or assisted other cooks during emergencies or rush periods
